person.persName: Benjamin Casey Allin (Mercer County, Kentucky, circuit clerk)

body.p: Mercer County, Kentucky, circuit clerk. Kentucky native. Son of Thomas Allin and Mary Jouett Allin. Married to Susan Hart Warren Allin in Mercer County, Kentucky, on January 28, 1829. Father of Benjmain Allin, commMaria "Kate" Allin, Phillip T. Allin, Bushrod W. Allin, William B. Allin, Susan J. Allin, Grant Allin, Mary D. Allin, and Thomas Allin. Clerk of the Mercer Circuit Court in Mercer County, Kentucky, in 1850. Owned seven enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1850. Clerk of Mercer Circuit Court in Mercer County in 1860. Owned two enslaved persons in Mercer County in 1860.
